Title: Establishes a time limit on utilizing third-party practice of no later than twenty days
Summary: Establishes a time limit on utilizing third-party practice of no later than twenty days unless consented to by the parties or upon written application of any of the parties to the main action or upon the consent of the court such time is extended.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to when third-party practice is allowed
